long_description: They do make things like they used to! This Coleman stainless-steel retro cooler was originally introduced in 1954. Stainless-steel lid and case deliver durability and keep ice for up to three days in temperatures up to 100deg F. Solid steel latch improves sealing; stainless-steel hinges and screws resist rusting and breakage. Large, sturdy stainless-steel handles with rubber grips are easy on the hands. Leak-proof, rust-resistant port drains ice water away; durable base and liner are easy to clean.
short_description: They do make things like they used to! This Coleman stainless-steel retro cooler was originally introduced in 1954.
